newsitem.title: FINLAND: RESEARCH ALERT - PSP UPS TIETO PRICE TARGET.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - PSP UPS TIETO PRICE TARGET.

text.p: Finnish bank Postipankki Oy's (PSP) equity research have raised the price target for data systems and services group TT Tieto Oy to 600.00 markka from 520.00, analyst Vesa Sahivirta said on Friday.
"The main reason is that EPS growth is stronger than we earlier expected," Sahivirta said.
TT Tieto on Thursday reported a 44 percent rise in H1 pre-tax profits with EPS up 70 percent at 9.18 markka.
PSP raised the full-year 1997 EPS forecast to 19.3 markka from 18.2 and the 1998 EPS forecast to 26.00 markka from 22.50.
Postipankki also introduced a forecast for TT Tieto's 1999 EPS at 33.80 markka, Sahivirta said.
At 1105/0805 GMT, TT Tieto traded at a record-high 530.00 markka, up 10.00 markka or 1.9 percent. The broad Helsinki market was over half a percentage point lower.
